content:
From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
AFP entries now have used-by fields, so you can see which other entries use your development.

A nice example is http://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Regular-Sets.shtml

Cheers,
Gerwin
